0: We were so glad we picked Redsalt as it turned out to be our best restaurant in Adelaide both for the food and the service
Cant fault the service in all departments breakfast was very good location is excellent more or less in the centre of the CBD
Our room was fine nice bathroom and decent dinner in the hotel dining room
Round the corner to Adelaides main Rundle Mall where you will find a great variety of shops and cinemas and eateries including pubs
All the mothers were presented with a boxed cupcake on Mothers Day breakfast
Breakfast were excellent and room was cozy
Friendly helpful staff at reception and in the bar and dinning room
We loved our breakfast in the morning too and there was certainly plenty to choose from in the buffet display
Breakfast was sensational with all you could wish for including a juicer to make your own healthy juices
1: We did not eat at the hotel but the breakfast did look great
I ordered pillows from the pillow menu to try and get the right one only a tontine type one was suitable
Apart from an issue at checkin with my booking which I did on your website the staff managed it well giving us a free drink in the bar while it was sorted
One staff member offered us a breakfast service which we were later denied when we went back to reception to confirm
We enjoyed breakfast in the restaurant too
My friend also enjoyed her barramundi dish very much
I was at tje Pylman for working and I enjoyed everthing except the Breakfast coffee
Breakfast was fine but nothing special
We really enjoyed our dinner and breakfast however the service in the restaurant in the evening was not up to our expectations
A couple of pizzas wine and a main meal at Pullman
2: Our only disappointment was the Salt Bar Lunch
My in room dining meal was very disappointing especially for the excessive price
It was just the breakfast experience that let you down
The diners space is a bit small
Even breakfast waiting on eggs being made I waited 20mins and still no answer
However the dining experience was poor
We were a little disappointed at breakfast
Menu quite extensive and reasonably priced
First I paid for breakfast in advance online but in check in was told I was entitled to complementary breakfast in the executive lounge
On mentioning it was my husbands birthday they sent up special dessert tray
